evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing in their applications.
HIPAA compliance is noted in their data handling practices on the health insights provided.
The platform supports X12 EDI transactions which are crucial for health data exchange.
They provide integration patterns such as REST APIs for interoperability with other health systems.
Use of Google Cloud Pub/Sub for managing real-time data streams.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses X12 transactions and healthcare integration patterns aligned with ICP criteria.
matched_use_cases: X12 EDI Transactions for claims processing
Integration with payers and providers using HL7 and FHIR
